EmailTemplate.subject: FW: Inquiry with MBO Partners (1318946567.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Harris,
I hope all is well. I wanted to reach out again to schedule a time for us to speak about the MBO Partners program so I am able to answer any questions you have about our services. I have attached a link to my time trade calendar below for you to select a convenient time to speak for your schedule.
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
I look forward to hearing from you!
Have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Monday, September 19, 2011 3:45 PM To: 'hweisman@yahoo.com' Subject: Inquiry with MBO Partners
Dear Harris,
You had recently shared your information with MBO Partners, and as a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I left you. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I am including my contact information. And, so you may easily book a time that is convenient for you, I am including a link tomy online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
You can also watch a short video about who we are on youtube: (same comment as above – why YouTube?) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1.
I look forward to speaking with you,
Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
